description.@en: We shall be delivered from pain’s threshold . . .

criticalFailure.@en: As you blow the smoke over them, they fall Asleep and experience strange dreams. When awakening six hours later, they are Incapacitated! and gain 3 Conflict.

criticalSuccess.@en: They are moved two steps up instead.

effect.@en: After successfully casting, you move a person one step up the Damage & Peril Condition Tracks positively.

reagents.@en: A fire, which you use to breathe its smoke inward to exhale over the wounded
